fixes.name: Quantity vs Returned
fixes.solution_explanation: This is a row-level subtraction using only columns from the same table, so it should be implemented as a calculated column.

fixes.name: New Cust Name
fixes.solution_explanation: This simply returns the value of a row-level field from the same table, so it should be implemented as a calculated column.

fixes.name: Date of Delivery
fixes.solution_explanation: This simply returns the row-level date field from the same table, so it should be implemented as a calculated column.
